CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Insight_Profile__c , 'Green') , IMAGE( '/resource/GreenCircle', ' Green' , 30, 30), IF(ISPICKVAL( Insight_Profile__c , 'Red') , IMAGE( '/resource/RedColour', ' Red' , 30, 30), IF(ISPICKVAL( Insight_Profile__c , 'Blue') , IMAGE( '/resource/BlueColor', ' Blue' , 30, 30), IF(ISPICKVAL( Insight_Profile__c , 'Yellow') , IMAGE( '/resource/YellowColor', ' Yellow' , 30, 30), null))))
CustomField.label: Insight Profile
